enabled.name: Include Canvas Tokens On Timebased Refreshed
enabled.hint: When enabled will not just check the party, but also all tokens on the canvas to see to refresh their uses. Note this will have performance implications if you have a large number of actors

aeon-pearly-white.name: Automate Aeon Stone (Pearly White Spindle)
aeon-pearly-white.hint: Automates the healing for aeon stone pearly white spindle (currently only out of combat) (Roll: Roll healing, Automatic: Heal actor + msg)

enabled.name: Show Cooldown Icons in Inventory
enabled.hint: Adds icons that show the cooldown of actions to the user if they own the creature

gm-only.name: Show only for GMs
gm-only.hint: Locks the feature to adds icons that show the cooldown as a GM only feature, overrides the 'Player Enabled' feature

style.name: How to show time remaining?
style.hint: Based on this setting adds text to the tooltip to show the time remaining on the cooldown. Certain settings allow for vague time left than others
